expo.name: Athletia
expo.description: Athletia is a platform which provides the foundation for increasing the relationship between students and school`s athletic departments, by providing a unique student focused platform which benefits both the students themselves and the schools who uses this platform. Athletia`s main goal is to increase attendance at school sports events and drives student satisfaction and well-being for any school which uses its platform.
